title: Theresa May – 2019 Speech at Northwood
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, on 8 July 2019.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)
